divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sept. 30th 2003 Myself and 3 of my 4 children walked outside like we do everyschool morning at 700 am to wait on the school bus that picks up the kids infront of the house. When we walked outside,standing on the front porch I lookedup at the sky like i always do...and there it was. I had no idea what it was. Itwas kinda shaped like an arrowhead it was a solid color, but changed colors whenthe sunlight hit it. Colors where redish-orange to red and would also turn agolden color.It was headed NE. And seemed to stay on that coarse. We watched itfor about 6 minutes then it just vanished. I told my husband about it later andhe called the police dept. and asked if anyone else had called in about it andthey said no.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sherman
There were no other sightings in Sherman on or around September 30th 2003
Summary: Almost arrowhead shape orangeish red color
